Title: Tupperware Party Massacre
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Brad Falchuk, John J. Gray (story editor), Crystal Liu (staff writer), Todd Kubrak (script coordinator)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Michael Chiklis, Frances Conroy
Plot: Jimmy wallows in self-pity, and Dandy sets out to destroy the man who deprived him of the twins. Meanwhile, Desiree meets an old flame, and Elsa and Stanley track the Tattlers.
